locations.name: London
locations.description: England's vibrant capital city, known for its rich history, royal landmarks, world-class museums, theatre, and diverse neighbourhoods.

locations.name: Scottish Highlands
locations.description: A vast and sparsely populated region in northern Scotland characterized by dramatic mountain ranges, deep lochs (lakes), ancient castles, and wild beauty.

locations.name: The Cotswolds
locations.description: An Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty in south-central England, famous for its rolling hills, picturesque honey-coloured stone villages, and charming countryside.
